basics.name: Bruno Moya
basics.summary:
I'm Bruno Moya, an entrepreneur from Barcelona, ​​named "19-year-old tech entrepreneur more digital than most CTOs, CMOs and CEOs", founder and creator of Glassear.

For the past 8 years, I've been working on the headset that democratizes augmented reality by allowing users to effortlessly connect and experience next-generation digital experiences.

I have won many awards and have given many talks at different events (even in India!) explaining how I started in the world of entrepreneurship and managed to bring my #glassear product to the market and compete with #Microsoft and #Google.

Much more content and information on my website brunomoya.com
basics.headline: Speaker and Expert in AR/VR/MR, creator of Glassear, the helmet that democratizes MIXED REALITY.

location.address: C/ Prat de la Riba 5, Santpedor

items.name: glazing
items.summary:
- I learn the process of product design and development.
- I learn to teach and participate in events as Speaker.
- Develop my teamwork skills.
- Expand my knowledge of the market of AR VR and Mixed Reality technologies.
items.position: Orador - Speaker - AR/VR/MR - Mixed reality - Glassear

items.name: HandMotion
items.summary: Developing Mixed Reality apps for my Glassear helmet using Manomotion algorithms together with the Glassear SDK. In the process, I learned and improved in the design of interfaces for this area. Also help in the development of your algorithm, thanks to my previous knowledge of OpenCV and Neural Networks.

items.name: Computer Vision Center
items.summary: I developed Artificial Intelligence content with OpenCV and object and pose tracking neural networks as well as face tracking. I quote, 'Sometimes we forgot how old we were when assigning him a task.'

items.title: Hackaton Winner Most Creative Project
items.summary: My facet as a computer engineering student has opened my spirit to develop more scientific projects, having won the prize for the most creative project with my App 'Whatshate', sponsored by Everis, which fights directly and easily against cyberbullying.

items.title: Manomojies Gamejam
items.summary: Winner of the 3rd prize in the Gamejam organized by Manomotion, based on the theme of the use of Hand Tracking and augmented reality mixed with emojies.

items.title: Manomotion Superheroes Gamejam
items.summary: Winner of the 3rd prize in the Gamejam organized by Manomotion, based on the theme of the use of Hand Tracking and augmented reality mixed with the theme of superheroes together with Avraam Georgiadis

items.title: Industry 4.0
items.summary: Winner of the 2nd Prize as the most interesting project for the future of Industry 4.0.

items.title: maker of merit
items.summary: More than 4 prizes awarded by the organization to the most interesting Maker of the event, as well as a very special one signed by David Cuartelles, co-founder of Arduino.

items.name: lectures in public
items.level: 15+ talks behind my back and counting.

items.name: Brainmate (formerly NotionAI MyMind)
items.summary: Project that mixes Artificial Intelligence + Productivity and the incredible startup Notion, which has a figure of more than 1300 active users!
items.description: Your second brain powered by AI.

items.name: Manomojies
items.summary: This app allows you to place emojis in your reality using your hand, even search for emojis out of the box! Fill your world with emojis right now and start building your own story!

items.name: TripDepart | The traveling social network!
items.summary: A perfect social platform to discover nearby places and travel friends.
items.description: TripDepart es una aplicación de viaje social que te conecta instantáneamente con los viajeros cerca de usted.

items.name: FaceFilter
items.summary: FaceFilter uses facial recognition systems to turn you into your favorite character, like Instagram filters, just search for their name in the PoemMask search engine.
items.description: Filtros de realidad aumentada + api + visión por ordenador

courses: MGL843-01 Sujets avancés en conception logicielle
items.summary: Last semester of the degree in Montreal, Quebec, Canada for more than 5 months.
I am part of the entrepreneurship club of the University.
I have a B2 in French thanks to it.

items.name: English
items.level: B2 with specific knowledge of computing

items.summary: I am collaborating with the non-profit organization Fecamm (Federació Catalana de malalties minoritàries), in the process of introducing Games on its Platform so that people with Rare diseases can play. In relation to this, we have organized a month-long GameJam in collaboration with the UAB, UPC, and different hospitals.

items.name: Glassear, mixed reality within everyone's reach.
items.summary: Article written for the virtual magazine about 3D printing in a special edition dedicated to mixed and virtual reality!
